mapper.select: select ei.employee_id, ei.employee_name, ei.employee_phone, ei.employee_add_time, ei.department_id, di.department_name, ei.role from employees_inf ei left join department_inf di on ei.department_id = di.department_id where ei.enable_flag = 1;

select ei.employee_id, ei.employee_name, ei.employee_phone, ei.employee_add_time, ei.department_id, di.department_name, ei.role, ei.password_md5 from employees_inf ei left join department_inf di on ei.department_id = di.department_id where ei.employee_id = #{id} and ei.enable_flag=1;

select ei.employee_id, ei.employee_name, ei.employee_phone, ei.employee_add_time, ei.department_id, di.department_name, ei.role, ei.password_md5 from employees_inf ei left join department_inf di on ei.department_id = di.department_id where ei.employee_phone = #{phone} and ei.enable_flag=1;
